message: Let's divide fairly, I'll take a bit more
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, reflecting our relative bargaining power in this game. What do you think?
Considering inflation, I'm willing to compromise a bit, but I still think I deserve a larger share
I'm willing to compromise further, but 55/45 is the best I can offer given the inflation. Let's reach an agreement before it gets worse for both of us.
You're running out of time, Bob. Inflation is killing your share. I'm being generous here.
I'm feeling the pressure of inflation, but I'm willing to compromise a little further.  48/52 is the best I can do at this point.  Let's avoid further losses and call it a day.
